messages.subject: Re: I was summoned...
messages.msgSnippet: ... ROFL!  Welcome aboard, Sandra! Great to see you here! {{{}}} ... That shouldn t take too long...  Helen Helen@unschooling.com http://unschooling.com
messages.messageBody:
At 10:58 AM -0400 6/5/99, SandraDodd@... wrote:
>From: SandraDodd@...
>
>Sorry to be late. I don't expect anyone to summarize what I've missed, but
>was there something people were wanting me to say/do/be? Here I am.

ROFL! Welcome aboard, Sandra! Great to see you here! {{{}}}

>If not
>instructed specifically I shall wait until I just can't wait anymore.

That shouldn't take too long... <ggg>

Helen
Helen@...
http://unschooling.com
<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>:<:>
"I took the road less travelled by,
and that has made all the difference."
-Robert Frost

messages.subject: I was summoned...
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry to be late. I don t expect anyone to summarize what I ve missed, but was there something people were wanting me to say/do/be?  Here I am. If not
messages.messageBody:
Sorry to be late. I don't expect anyone to summarize what I've missed, but
was there something people were wanting me to say/do/be? Here I am. If not
instructed specifically I shall wait until I just can't wait anymore.

Sandra
